title: Riot fix this already......?
body:
Here is my post from 16 days ago : https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nInybsxh-2nd-time-this-has-happened
I was told it my "connection" (Cop out answer imo)
Here goes a more recent one
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/LP0TKmZr-champion-list-not-appearing-in-select
Are we just gonna ignore this?

replies.body:
I went ahead and referenced both of those others posts. While it may not seem like it could be a connection issue on your end, your champions not showing up is most likely happening because your client isn't able to grab the available list of champions for your account from the servers.

Essentially this is how it works, when you buy champions that information is stored on our servers (that way you can change computers and still have all your champions). If you see that blank window where you champions should be, it means your network is trying to access the database of which champs it needs to show you. If your network isn't able to get a solid connection with our servers, it won't be able to get any of that info and won't show you anything at all!

Make sure you're going through all those steps in the guide given to update your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If those steps don't help at all, hit me back up and let me know! This is just the first step in troubleshooting, but more often than not those steps alone help fix the problem.
I get 30ish ping in game and live right next to Chicago, if im having problems how many other people are O.O

Just being next to the Servers isn't going to ensure that you have the most optimal connection! As for how many other people are having connection issues, that depends on their connection to the Server. I don't have that answer, but if you're still having issues after running through the guide my friend Broporo has given you I would suggest submitting a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our tech team for more help!

It isn't the network though like it's happening to everyone.
I'd look through the files of the latest patch and see if nothing is out of place, like I've heard from multiple people that this issue has been happening all over the place and I know some people that their internet is fantastic. I for one have decent internet and I've been playing League for over a year now and this has never happened to me and my ISP is reliable when it comes to online gaming, so I beg of you to send this to most of the team workers and look through most of the coding that was implemented into the latest patch. I for one want to play League more and have no issue whatsoever. I'm a league-o-holic when it comes to playing :p.
